desserts.name: White chocolate and cake pop ice-cream dessert
desserts.description: Turn Christmas dessert into pop art with these colourful baubles sandwiched between sweet vanilla ice-cream and a crunchy biscuit shell.

desserts.name: Fairy bread icebox cake
desserts.description: For the perfect party cake, try this fairy bread icebox cake made from storebought biscuits.

desserts.name: 'Better than Brad Pitt' five-layer dessert
desserts.description: This pudding is an update of a 1970's American dessert known as 'Better than Robert Redford'. It includes chocolate in all its forms - white, dark, milk. Team with cream, and it's a dream come true.

desserts.name: S'mores waffles
desserts.description: Keep it short and sweet with this s'mores dessert that is ready in a flash.

desserts.name: Tiramisu fridge cake
desserts.description: Impress your guests with this showstopper tiramisu fridge cake.

desserts.name: Double-choc brownie 'sausage rolls'
desserts.description: Kids and adults alike will get a kick out of this sweet spin on a footy-party classic. Maybe we should save them for April Fools' Day!

desserts.name: Panna cotta and jaffa mousse with boozy strawberries
desserts.description: A special occasion dessert that tastes as spectacular as it looks. Made with care and love it's a perfect end to any dinner party.

desserts.name: Chocolate mousse slice with hazelnut praline
desserts.description: Cooking for a crowd and want to treat them to a special dessert? Try this chocolate mousse slice that serves 30.

desserts.name: Polka dot angel food cake
desserts.description: Show off your angelic side with this creative vanilla cake dessert. Chocolate ganache covered in sprinkles makes it taste heavenly.

desserts.name: Vanilla labne tart with sesame sprinkle
desserts.description: Whether it's for morning tea or dessert, this decadent nutty tart will win everyone over.

desserts.name: Martha's baked Alaska with chocolate cake and chocolate ice-cream
desserts.description: Chocolate ice-cream in an oven? If it's bundled up in a thick layer of meringue, the outside caramelises and inside remains brilliantly chilly.

desserts.name: Apple-filled monkey bread
desserts.description: Gooey dough balls stuffed with seasonal apples and drizzled with caramel make a very sweet dessert indeed.

desserts.name: Rich chocolate custard poke cake
desserts.description: We've put a spin on this popular cake from the 1970's and filled the holes with thick chocolate custard instead of classic jelly.

desserts.name: Fairy bread layered sponge
desserts.description: For the ultimate party cake, wow a crowd with this spectacular 3-layer fairy bread sponge.

desserts.name: Over-the-top chunky chocolate brownie tart
desserts.description: 15Over-the-top chunky chocolate brownie tart

desserts.name: Chewy pavlova with caramel and Nutella fudge sauce
desserts.description: Our sky-high pavlova tower is drizzled with sweet caramel, a gooey Nutella sauce and finished with chocolate eggs.

desserts.name: Sweet potato pancake stack
desserts.description: Sweet potato adds a quirky twist to classic pancakes. With ricotta and maple syrup on top, it's delicious whether it's a sweet breakfast, brunch or dessert.

desserts.name: Sweet 'sushi' cakes
desserts.description: This adorable sweet 'sushi' plate looks amazing but is ridiculously easy. Bought sponge rolls, melted chocolate and sprinkles!

desserts.name: Giant Turkish delight marshmallow meringues
desserts.description: Love Turkish delight? Love meringue? Love marshmallows? All three favourites come together in this fun tea-time treat.

desserts.name: Grilled cinnamon doughnuts with maple bananas
desserts.description: We all need a treat to get through the working week, and these ones are ready fast.
